instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3126 high-speed fan
threads.message:
Hi, this imac has been repaired the USB ports, when it turns on after a few seconds it starts to speed up the fan. 
 In HWmonitor shows that the fan of the ODD this accelerated and 128 Degrees GPU heatsink. How can I identify which sensor is causing this?

threads.title: 820-3126 high-speed fan
threads.message:
There should be a thermal sensor attached to GPU heatsink.
It is properly connected?
